---
title: "prod.features.yml"
---

## High-level description
The code is a YAML file that defines feature flags and segments for a production environment. It specifies flag configurations, including variants, rules, and rollouts, as well as segment definitions with match criteria and constraints.

## Code Structure
This file represents data in YAML format. It does not define any code symbols or logic. It is structured as a configuration file with sections for `namespace`, `flags`, and `segments`. The `flags` section lists individual feature flags with their properties, variants, and rules. The `segments` section defines user segments based on specific criteria.

## Symbols
This file does not define any code symbols. It is a data file in YAML format.

## Dependencies
This file does not have any dependencies. It is a data file in YAML format.

## Configuration
This file itself acts as a configuration file, defining feature flags and segments. It does not contain any further configuration options.

## Error Handling
N/A - This is a data file and does not contain any error handling logic.

## Logging
N/A - This is a data file and does not contain any logging mechanisms.

## API/Interface Reference
N/A - This is a data file and does not expose any API or interface.
